template-details.description: Cisco devices can act as DHCP Servers. This example shows how to configure DHCP and some standard parameters for a Data subnet in a scope.!!! Usage: clean
template-details.author: root

parameter.name: dhcp_pool_name
parameter.description: Descriptive name for the DHCP scope.

parameter.name: dhcp_ipv4_network_address
parameter.description: Network address for the DHCP IPv4 scope.

parameter.name: dhcp_ipv4_network_subnet_mask
parameter.description: Subnet mask of the network address for the DHCP IPv4 scope.

parameter.name: default_gateway_ipv4_address
parameter.description: Default gateway for the DHCP IPv4 scope.

parameter.name: dns_server1_ipv4_address
parameter.description: Primary DNS server for the DHCP scope.

parameter.name: dns_server2_ipv4_address
parameter.description: Secondary DNS server for the DHCP scope.

parameter.name: dhcp_domain_name
parameter.description: Domain name for the DHCP scope.

parameter.name: dhcp_lease_time_in_days
parameter.description: DHCP lease time in days for the scope.

cli.name: identity
cli.clicommand:
!!! MACRO name dhcp_server_data_subnet !!! Platform: ISR2951, ISR2921, ISR2911, ISR3925, ISR3945, Cat3750X, Cat3850, Cat3650 OS: !!! Preconditions: !!! Desc: Cisco devices can act as DHCP Servers. This example shows how to configure DHCP and some standard parameters for a Data subnet in a scope. !!! Usage: clean !!! Tags: dhcp, options, pool !!! Vars: Only use "_" special characters in variable names !!! $dhcp_pool_name: ; Descriptive name for the DHCP scope. !!! $dhcp_ipv4_network_address: ; Network address for the DHCP IPv4 scope. !!! $dhcp_ipv4_network_subnet_mask: ; Subnet mask of the network address for the DHCP IPv4 scope. !!! $default_gateway_ipv4_address: ; Default gateway for the DHCP IPv4 scope. !!! $dns_server1_ipv4_address: ; Primary DNS server for the DHCP scope. !!! $dns_server2_ipv4_address: ; Secondary DNS server for the DHCP scope. !!! $dhcp_domain_name: ; Domain name for the DHCP scope. !!! $dhcp_lease_time_in_days: ; DHCP lease time in days for the scope.
service dhcp
ip dhcp pool $dhcp_pool_name !!ip dhcp pool dhcp_pool_name network $dhcp_ipv4_network_address $dhcp_ipv4_network_subnet_mask !! network dhcp_ipv4_network_address dhcp_ipv4_network_subnet_mask default-router $default_gateway_ipv4_address !! default-router default_gateway_ipv4_address dns-server $dns_server1_ipv4_address $dns_server2_ipv4_address !! dns-server dns_server1_ipv4_address dns_server2_ipv4_address domain-name $dhcp_domain_name !! domain-name dhcp_domain_name lease $dhcp_lease_time_in_days !! lease dhcp_lease_time_in_days
